## Simple calculations  

```{r simple-alculations}
33+5
55*11
2**5
2^5
log(10)  # log computes logarithms, by default natural logarithms
log(10, 2)
e <- exp(1)
log(10, e)
log(10, exp(1))
log(10, 10) 
log(16) 
log(16, 2)    					
  	
33 + 11
a = (3.55 / 0.11)^3
print(a)

a<-33
a + 5
-a
a - 5
a*5
a/5

sqrt(a)
exp(a)

b <- (a * sqrt(a))/(log(a, 2)+1)
b

# R will do these operations element-wise
v1 = c(1, 2, 3, 4)
v2 = c(3, 5, 3, 5) # 'c' is Concatenate

v1 + v2
v1 * v2
v1^2
log(v2) 
v1/v2
t<-min(a,b)
t
t<-min(v1)
t
ls()
rm(a)
ls()
```
